title: Why do Colleges have to have all of these Supplemental Essays?
body:
God damnit.  This shit is never ending for me ffs.  Like how am I supposed to write a 500 to 1000 word essay on this:

>Much has been written about the environmental implications of climate change, but less about the distribution of goods or the social, economic, and political implications. Which one of these less studied aspects of climate change seems to you most worrisome for our “common home,” and why?

WHAT DOES THIS EVEN HAVE TO DO WITH THE COLLEGE.

KASLHDFJLASHDFKJLASDFHLKALJDSLFHLAKSDFHLKASJDFHAJSDFHKASDJFHKSDJHFSDKJAFHKJSF
